startPage.title: H5P Editor
startPage.welcomeMessage: Lumi's H5P Editor is a standalone application that lets you view, edit and create H5P.

startPage.title: Lumi Analytics
startPage.welcomeMessage: Lumi's Analytics tool lets you import user reports and visualizes them for you

bug_report.title: Bug & Crash Reports
bug_report.description: Help us improve our software and services by sending anonymous crash & bug reports.
bug_report.consent: I allow this application to send bug & crash reports.

usage_statistics.title: Usage Statistics
usage_statistics.description: Help us improve our software and services by sending anonymous usage statistics.
usage_statistics.consent: I allow this application to send anonymous usage statistics.

updates.title: Automatic Updates
updates.consent: I allow this application to automatically check for updates.

language.title: Language
language.description: Change the language of the application.

privacy_policy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy_policy.consent: I have read and consent to the privacy policy.

setup_dialog.description: Protecting the individual's privacy is important for us. We only collect the information you choose to give us, and we process it with your consent. We want to be as transparent as possible. However Lumi relies on some connections and data transfers to work.
setup_dialog.consent_warning: You need to at least consent to the privacy policy to use this application.

export_as_html.error: Could not export H5P as HTML

dialog.title: Lumi reporter
dialog.description: Do you want to include a reporter in your html? Learn more about it
